r:
Cree : Words / nēhiyawēwin : itwēwina
Maskwacîs Cree Dictionary
{# these two entrieshave common analysis: pisin+V+AI+Imp+Imm+2Sg#} {# There definition should be merged #} {# There are 2 duplicate definitions. They should be merged #}
asawâpiwin NI-1 asawâpiwin-
A place designated as a look-out. E.g. A watchtower.
hunting-blind; a place to watch from; look-out, lighthouse, watchtower; looking out
asawâpiwin NI-1 asawâpiwin-
A blind that is used by hunters, usually man-made, from trees shrubs or a hill, to watch for the enemy.
hunting-blind; a place to watch from; look-out, lighthouse, watchtower; looking out
